amendatorysection.catchline: Certificate of licensure; renewal; professional development requirements.
amendatorysection.para: (1) As a condition for renewal of a certificate of licensure issued pursuant to the Professional Landscape Architects Act, a licensee shall be required to successfully complete fifteen hours of professional development within the preceding calendar year.

(2) The board shall not renew the certificate of licensure of any licensee who has failed to complete the professional development requirements pursuant to subsection (1) of this section, unless he or she can show good cause why he or she was unable to comply with such requirements. If the board determines that good cause was shown, the board shall permit the licensee to make up all outstanding required hours of professional development.
